Intended Use: The selected precursor ion as reported by the instrument for isolation. Should be used for a `Spectrum`

The monoisotopic peak of the selected ion as determined by the implementation. Usually used for a `Spectrum`, but for chimeric or ambiguous spectra may also be used in an `Interpretation` or `InterpretationMember`
The theoretical m/z for an ion calculated by the implementation. Should be used for an `Analyte`
